about_the_game:
Help Pedro Ricardo Jr. to have his work card signed. That's right, you didn't get it wrong.

Spooky Workers is a 2D indie puzzle-platform game that tells the story of Pedro, a scared young man who got an internship at Madama Bruna's House of Horrors.

Do you know the difficult life of an intern? No? So get ready.

Wear a dinosaur head (that you made yourself) and scare all the customers to get the boss's attention. Think it's simple? Telma from Human Resources will demand a lot from you and demand a senior job (even though you earn a pittance).

Complete the 40 phases by balancing the IDEAL TIME, collecting ALL THE ITEMS and scaring ALL THE CUSTOMERS (phew... I'm tired) to finally win the title of employee of the month and have your work card signed + benefits. It's every player's Pedro's dream, ,right?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 520, 1 GB or AMD Radeon R7 240, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
